page.title: 17Family Life.
page.content: On Saturday,my brother and I get up at 7.30 and watch TV until nine.At nine Mum and Dad get up and we all have Corn Flakes for breakfast. After breakfast, we all have a wash and get dressed. For the rest of the morning my bro- ther and I play in the garden. My Mum washes clothes and my Dad does jobs a- round the house.At 11.00 my Mum and Dad take me to my swimming lessons. When we get back from swimming we all have lunch. After we have had lunch our nanny comes to see us and we have a talk and play games. At 6.00 we have tea and after I have my bath while my Mum washes up. After my bath the whole family watches TV un- til nine. At nine my brother and I go to bed. Neil, Hawes Down.
